gopalv

I have uploaded the the decimal64 column, column patch for tests verification. Please ignore the previous comment, as it is the result of the old patch. My next patch run should be completed tonight. Can you please review the pull request at 

https://github.com/apache/hive/pull/830

I have addressed the comments you recommended during the decimal64 scalar review along with this change.

Thanks!
